title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cyber Risk is Business Risk: Managing Cloud Security Without Disruption(SEC212)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 网络风险即业务风险：在不中断业务的情况下管理云安全(SEC212)
abstract: Cyber risk is business risk, and managing it without disruption is essential to growth, trust, and resilience. As digital transformation accelerates, organizations face mounting pressure to unify visibility, quantify exposure, and align cybersecurity strategies with business goals. Northeast Georgia Health System exemplifies this shift, strengthening compliance, reducing complexity, and improving operational efficiency by connecting security insights to business outcomes. In this session, learn how NGHS is moving from reactive defense to proactive risk management to drive performance and resilience in the cloud and beyond. This presentation is brought to you by Trend Micro, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 网络风险就是业务风险，在不中断业务的情况下管理网络风险对于增长、信任和韧性至关重要。随着数字化转型的加速，组织面临着统一可见性、量化风险暴露以及将网络安全策略与业务目标保持一致的巨大压力。Northeast Georgia Health System 体现了这一转变，通过将安全洞察与业务成果相连接来加强合规性、降低复杂性并提高运营效率。在本次会议中，了解 NGHS 如何从被动防御转向主动风险管理，以推动云端及其他环境中的性能和韧性。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Trend Micro 为您呈现。
